titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” / Ṣälotä śǝryätä ḫaṭiʾat “Prayer of Absolution of Sins”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” (fols. 2ra-130rb) - Discourse of St. Athanasius on death (fols. 2ra-7rb) - Mäṣḥaf zä-wäḍʾat ʾǝm-ʾIyärusalem “Book that Came from Jerusalem” (fols. 15ra-22vb) - Homily by ʾabba Sälama, Metropolitan of Ethiopia (fols. 75va-77va) - Homily by St. Jacob of Serug for the funeral of priests and deacons (fols. 106vb-114vb) - Lǝfafä ṣǝdq “Bandlet of Righteousness” (fols. 126ra-129rb) - Mängädä sämay “Journey to Heaven” (fols. 129rb-130rb) II) Ṣälotä śǝryätä ḫaṭiʾat “Prayer of Absolution of Sins” (fols. 121vb-126ra), (cf. EMML no. 127(9)).

originlink.xlink:title: Qiʿat Däbrä Ṣǝyon Qǝddǝst Maryam / QDS

locationlink.xlink:title: Qiʿat Däbrä Ṣǝyon Qǝddǝst Maryam / QDS

copyists.copyist: Wäldä Gäbrǝʾel is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication formulas on fols. 10va, 28vb.

donors.donor: ʾIyasu is mentioned in the supplication formulas on fols. 10va, 28vb, 95rb, 96vb; his name is inserted interlineally on several fols., e.g., 89rb, 91va, 92rab. The name Ḫirutä Śǝllase is added interlineally in a secondary hand on fols. 10va, 28vb, 45va, 91va, 115vb; Nǝṣḥa Dǝngǝl is mentioned on several fols., e.g., 28vb, 72ra, 81rb, 95rb, 96va; Wäldä ʾIyasu is mentioned on several fols., e.g., 92vb, 93ra, 94vb; the names of several other people are also mentioned.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. shows traces of extensive use. Several fols. are stained with wax and dirt or humidity; some fols. have been damaged by rodents, e.g., fols. 48, 49, 57; tears or cuts have been amended on fols. 50, 51. Both boards are broken, the front one has been repaired, half of the back one is missing.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (both are broken) previously covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; the leather cover has been torn off for the most part, only remains are preserved on the inner side of the book. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather (at least one tool was used: double line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine folds of the quires, close to the head and tail of the codex.

squires.squire: I(9; s.l.: 1, stub after 9/fols. 1r-9v) – II(8/fols. 10r-17v) – III(8/fols. 18r-25v) – IV(8/fols. 26r-33v) – V(8/fols. 34r-41v) – VI(8/fols. 42r-49v) – VII(8/fols. 50r-57v) – VIII(8/fols. 58r-65v) – IX(8/fols. 66r-73v) – X(8/fols. 74r-81v) – XI(8/fols. 82r-89v) – XII(8/fols. 90r-97v) – XIII(7; s.l.: 7, stub before 1/fols. 98r-104v) – XIV(8/fols. 105r-112v) – XV(7; s.l.: 1, stub after 7/fols. 113r-119v) – XVI(7; s.l.: 7, stub before 1/fols. 120r-126v) – XVII(5/s.l.: 1, stub after 5/fols. 127r-131v).

taunit.mr-info: Fol. 2r-119v; all data are for fol. 14r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Fol. 120r-130r; all data are for fol. 123r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; the name of the donors and the scribe; a few lines on the incipit page of Text I, alternating with black lines and a few lines in the incipit of Text II; incipit of each section of the text; abbreviations; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals; some other words, e.g., wä-kaʿǝbä (e.g., fols. 110rb, 125rb), ṣällǝyu (e.g., fol. 31vb), halle luya (e.g., fols. 2vab, 3rab, 4vb, 25ra), wä-ʾǝmzǝ (e.,g., fols. 35rb, 41ra), wä-yǝbälu (e.g., fols. 16rb, 17va), qǝdmä (wangel) (e.g., fols. 29vb, 35rb), ʾǝgäle (e.g., fols. 35vb, 36ra, 52rb), dǝḫrä (e.g. fols. 29vb, 33ra).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ይ፡ ሕ፡ for ይበሉ፡ ሕዝብ፡ (e.g., fol. 39rb) ይ፡ ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (e.g., fols. 39rb, 39va) ይ፡ ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካሕን፡ (e.g., fols. 39rb, 39va) ሃሌ፡ (ሉ) for ሃሌ፡ ሉያ (e.g., fols. 3vab, 4rab, 60rab) ሃ፡ for ሃሌ፡ ሉያ (e.g., fol. 68va) ፍ፡ for ፍቱሐ፡ ወንጹሐ፡ ረስዮ፡ ለዝንቱ፡ በድን፡ (e.g., fols. 23rab, 23vab) ይት፤ ወይ፤ ስሙ፤ ለእ፤ for ይትአኰት፡ ወይሴባሕ፡ ስሙ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ (e.g., fol. 27rab) ወልደ፡ ገብ for the name of the scribe ወልደ፡ ገብርኤል (fol. 28vb).

extras.extra: - Short ownership (?) note: ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘደብረ፡ ጫያት: fol. 130v. - Crude drawing: fol. 1v. - Crude drawing of two humans; legend: Gäbrä Maryam: fol. 131r. - The word ʾǝgäle is marked above and below with dashes: fols. 4ra, 40vb. - The end of the line is taken up: fol. 24ra. - Omitted letters and words are written interlineally: fols. 27rb, 53va, 60vb, 69ra, 72va, 124vb. - Erasures: fol. 29rb. - Corrections written over erasures: fol. 55rb. - Space for rubricated names or words left unfilled: fols. 45vb, 53ra. - Lacunae (space for rubricated lines left unfilled): fol. 28v. - The (rubricated) name of the king is missing (erased or left unfilled?): fols. 30rb, 46ra. - The text on fol. 105rb has been damaged and is partly illegible. - Scribbles and doodles: fols. 1r, 9r, 130v. - Pen trials on fols. 130v, 131v(?). - Fol. 1 is unruled.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Notes in the upper margin referring to the content of the Ms.: ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 1v ዘሙታን፡: fol. 11r ሙታን፡: fol. 12r ዘሙታን፡: fol. 13r ሶበ፡ ይወጽእ፡ እም፡ ቤት፡: fol. 29v በካህናት፡ ወንጌል፡ ግንዘት: fol. 30v በ፩ምዕራፍ፡: fol. 33r በ፪ምዕራፍ፡: fol. 35r በ፫ምዕራፍ፡: fol. 37v በ፬ምዕራፍ፡: fol. 39v በ፭ምዕራፍ፡: fol. 41r በ፮ምዕራፍ፡: fol. 50v ምንባብ፡ ዘካህናት፡: fol. 85v ዘካህናት፡: fol. 87r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 88r ?: fol. 88v ዘካህናት፡: fol. 89r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 90r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 91r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 92r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 93r ?: fol. 93v ዘካህናት፡: fol. 94r ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 95r ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 96r ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 97r ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 98r ዘሙታን፡: fol. 99r ዘሙታን፡: fol. 100r ዘሙታን፡ ኵሎሙ፡: fol. 101r ሙታን፡: fol. 102r ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 102v በኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 103r ዘኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 104r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 106v ዘካህናት፡: fol. 107r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 108r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 109r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 110r ዘካህናት፡: fol. 111r ዘካህናት፡ ወኵሎሙ፡ ሙታን፡: fol. 112r ጸሎተ፡ ቡራኬ፡: 114v ቡራኬ፡: 115r. - Coloured threads have been inserted in the upper corner of fols. 32, 106, 110.

frames.frame: Fol. 2r (incipit of Text I): simple coloured (black, red, white) ornamental band with three simple lateral extensions (black lines); anthropomorphic motifs (human face).
